alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Eddy Plains; Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 20 at 1:35PM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ TO 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ MONDAY FOR VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS AND THE NORTHERN PERMIAN BASIN... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Red Flag Warning for the Southeast New Mexico plains and the northwest Permian Basin, which is in effect from 11 AM CST /10 AM MST/ to 7 PM CST /6 PM MST/ Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Gaines, Dawson, Chaves Plains, Eddy Plains and Lea. * TIMING...Late Monday morning into Monday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Near 15 percent. * RFTI...4 or near critical.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity and warm temperatures will increase potential for fire growth.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Eddy Plains; Lea
